daedric_quests.name: The Black Star
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to innkeeper about recent events
daedric_quests.description: Azura tasks you with recovering her artifact and restoring it
objectives: Speak to Aranea Ienith at the Shrine of Azura
Choose: Restore star to Azura OR corrupt it to hold black souls

restore_to_azura.reward: Azura's Star (infinite reusable soul gem for white souls)
restore_to_azura.moral: Good choice, honor the Daedric Prince

create_black_star.reward: The Black Star (infinite reusable soul gem for black souls/humanoid)

daedric_quests.name: Boethiah's Calling
daedric_quests.trigger: Read the book 'Boethiah's Proving' or find cultists
daedric_quests.description: Boethiah demands you prove your worth through betrayal and combat
objectives: Lead a follower to the Sacellum
Sacrifice your follower on the Pillar of Sacrifice
Defeat the other cultists in ritual combat
daedric_quests.moral_dilemma: Requires sacrificing a companion who trusts you
daedric_quests.reward: Ebony Mail (armor with silence and poison aura)
daedric_quests.gm_note: This quest tests if players will betray companions for power

daedric_quests.name: A Daedra's Best Friend
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Lod about a missing dog
daedric_quests.description: Help Clavicus Vile reunite with his companion Barbas, but beware the monkey's paw
objectives: Choose: Kill Barbas for the axe OR spare Barbas for the Masque

kill_barbas.reward: Rueful Axe (powerful but not Daedric artifact)

spare_barbas.reward: Masque of Clavicus Vile (improve Speech and prices)

daedric_quests.name: Discerning the Transmundane
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Septimus Signus north of Winterhold
daedric_quests.description: Hermaeus Mora demands you unlock the secrets of a Dwemer lockbox
objectives: Return to Septimus with the blood
daedric_quests.reward: Oghma Infinium (choose to permanently increase skills in Warrior, Mage, or Thief path)
daedric_quests.gm_note: Ties into main quest and Elder Scroll retrieval

daedric_quests.name: Ill Met By Moonlight
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Sinding in Falkreath Jail
daedric_quests.description: Hunt a werewolf for Hircine or help the werewolf escape
objectives: Speak to Sinding about his curse
Hunt Sinding in Bloated Man's Grotto
Choose: Kill Sinding OR help him kill the hunters

kill_sinding.reward: Savior's Hide (magic and poison resistance armor)

help_sinding.consequence: Hircine respects the hunt either way

daedric_quests.name: The Cursed Tribe
daedric_quests.description: Help an Orc stronghold regain Malacath's favor
objectives: Retrieve Troll Fat and Daedra Heart

daedric_quests.name: Pieces of the Past
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Silus Vesuius at his house
daedric_quests.description: Reassemble Mehrunes' Razor, but at what cost?
objectives: Visit the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon
Choose: Kill Silus for the dagger OR spare him and refuse

kill_silus.reward: Mehrunes' Razor (dagger with chance to instantly kill)

daedric_quests.name: The Whispering Door
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Hulda or Jarl's children
daedric_quests.description: Mephala whispers of murder and betrayal in Whiterun
objectives: Investigate the locked door in Dragonsreach
Get key from Farengar or Balgruuf
Speak to Mephala through the Whispering Door
daedric_quests.reward: Ebony Blade (two-handed sword that absorbs health, grows stronger with betrayal)
daedric_quests.gm_note: Sword strengthens by killing friends/allies - ultimate betrayal weapon

daedric_quests.name: Waking Nightmare
daedric_quests.trigger: Speak to Erandur at Windpeak Inn
objectives: Choose: Destroy the Skull of Corruption OR take it and kill Erandur

destroy_skull.consequence: No artifact but saved the town

take_skull.reward: Skull of Corruption (staff that steals dreams and deals damage)

daedric_quests.name: The House of Horrors
daedric_quests.description: Molag Bal, the King of Rape, demands you corrupt a priest of Boethiah
objectives: Torture and kill Logrolf on the altar
daedric_quests.reward: Mace of Molag Bal (absorbs stamina and magicka, soul traps)
daedric_quests.gm_warning: Most evil quest in game - involves torture. Handle with care.

daedric_quest_mechanics.discovery: Most are found through rumors, books, or NPC interactions
daedric_quest_mechanics.moral_weight: All Daedric quests involve moral choices - actions have consequences
daedric_quest_mechanics.artifacts: Daedric artifacts are powerful but may have dark costs
daedric_quest_mechanics.reputation: Dealing with Daedra affects how NPCs view the party

running_daedric_quests: Daedric Princes are alien and amoral
Artifacts are tempting but come with strings
Not all rewards are worth the cost
Let players face consequences of evil choices
gm_guidance.integration: Daedric quests can run parallel to main quest and civil war
